Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Enable IPackageFeature to reload package" (#1300) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "Replace System.IO.Packaging.Package with custom abstraction" (#1299) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
System.IO.Packaging is used to handle the package and parts. However, the types there are not designed well to be composed or overridden. We should add some abstractions that would handle this so we can build some features that need to intercept these calls.

- [ ] Add abstractions to `main`
- [ ] Obsolete OpenXmlPackage.Package on `release/v2.20.0`

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Consider removing OpenXmlPackage.Close()" (#1298) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: There are two APIs that do the same thing: `Close()` and `Dispose()`. There is no need to have `Close()` as it is better to use the dispose pattern. Let's take v3.0 as a chance to remove this API and just use `Dispose()`.
